doc:
Rex Reed https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rex_Reed 0 Rex Taylor Reed (born October 2, 1938) is an American film critic and former co-host of the syndicated television show At the Movies. He writes the column "On the Town with Rex Reed" for The New York Observer. Rex_Taylor_Reed ( born October_2_,_1938 ) is an_American_film_critic and former co-host of the_syndicated_television_show At the_Movies . He writes the_column " On the_Town with Rex_Reed " for The_New_York_Observer .
